verbs.description: [ARG1: record] - [V: breaking] [ARG0: number] of west nile cases reported in mass it a record - breaking year for west nile virus in massachusetts so far 42 cases have been confirmed the highest number ever reported here in a single year the previous record was 33 in 2012 the state department of public health on friday announced four new cases in humans all of whom became sick enough to require hospitalization west nile monica bharel department of public health franklin county mass massachusetts plymouth county middlesex county
